flawed_nl_solution:
From each tire repair, he made 20-5=$<<20-5=15>>15 profit
So repairs made him a profit of 15*300=$<<15*300=4500>>4500
The two complex repairs each made him 300-50=$<<300-50=520>>520 profit
So those added 520*2=$<<520*2=1040>>1040
So his total profit from everything was 4500+1040+2000=$<<4500+1040+2000=7540>>7540
So he made a profit of 7540-4000=$<<7540-4000=3540>>3540
#### 3540

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 250, not 520. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
